info.brief_description: You can create a story of type that involves wedgies, real life or not.
info.description:
After reading so many wedgie stories, I've decided to make an interactive story that can take place in any universe. Anyone can be wedgied, male or female. Feel free to add to what ever you want, but I only ask that you try to add at least a paragraph when the story asks for it. Don't just keep it going with "other" or anything like that. But the options of who gets wedgied where and when are limitless. If you don't see an option you would want to add to, feel free to add it in, and open the door for other writers to write their own pieces. Above all that, have fun and bring on the wedgies!

Edit: ok everyone! I'm back and I've also brought this story back from the dead also. Though I did a purge of chapters I didn't think fit the story. You can continue to add to these stories but I ask you all to add at least a paragraph and don't continuously fight over chapters and keep changing the overall setting of the sections. I've seen it before and don't like it. Also, no incest. That really rubs me the wrong way.

Also I should stress that there is to be no sexual-like content with any character under 18. Wedgies are fine but nothing sexual.
